name: Catalyst: Blind Faith
summary:
Catalyst: Blind Faith is a mature, dark fantasy, adventure-themed visual novel with horror elements. In a land where Gods are real and demons lurk in the heart of mankind, you take control of a troubled young priest, seeking to conquer your demons— inside and out.

The player has a gargantuan web of choices at their disposal, which may not always be as they appear. Exacerbating or aiding the mental illness and physical challenges that the protagonist faces is an ever-present concern, as well as balancing divine powers (which come at a cost). Interwoven systems also determines how you can interact with the expansive world, or the fate of your very soul.
